title: Cursed Ambrosia
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Cursed Ambrosia, filth, thick stain, I hate
you.  I hate your vicious pull, your pleading,
weeping wrappings, your hideous sweet taste.

I wield sharp, vicious fangs in your cruel name
piercing skin to draw you forth from those I’ve slain,
cursed Ambrosia, filth, thick stain I hate.

I [[[flesh-and-blood|once loved]]] the warm bright rays you’ve made
me trade for [[[herman-fuller-presents-dracula|cold dank caves]]].  By day, I dream
filthy dreams of your hideous sweet taste.

Your call’s so fierce, it draws me forth to sate
the need you gave to go blood-hunting again.
[[[lycoris-radiata|Mere mortals]]] can’t repel me, filth. Thick stain, I hate

this strength you’ve given me.  Please, let some hero stake
me through!  Rid me of you!  [[[scp-7589|Break my chains!]]]
Unbind me from your hideous sweet taste.

But your scent’s too sweet.  I can’t escape.
‘Til the end of days, they’ll [[[stains-of-blood-and-sin|shudder at my name]]].
Blight, cursed ambrosia, filth, you’ve made
me a slave to your hideous sweet taste.
